edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.primitives

Class DecommitmentsPackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.primitives.DecommitmentsPackage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DecommitmentsPackage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This package gathering together some objects that should be sent over the offline protocol.

    In order to be as fast as we can, we send a group of thing instead of every one of them alone.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DecommitmentsPackage

        public DecommitmentsPackage(int numCircuits,
                    int hashSize,
                    int keySize,
                    int inputSize,
                    int s)
        A constructor that sets the given size parameters and allocate space for the decommitments arrays.
        Parameters:
        numCircuits - number of circuits to decommit on.
        hashSize - Size of the output of the hash function, in bytes.
        keySize - Size of each key, in bytes.
        inputSize - Size of the input, in bytes.
        s - Security parameter.

        Returned the difference commitment ino the given index.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the difference commitment that should be returned.
        size - The size of the decommitment objects to return.
        Returns:
